CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Four model compounds , ( BDTT - DPP ) 3 , (BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP) , (BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD) , and ( BDTT - TPD ) 3 were used and calculated for comparison.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Material Name" entities in the form of a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| BDTT - DPP |
| (BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP) |
| (BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD) |
| BDTT - TPD |

Note: I've assumed that "BDTT" is a part of the material name, as it is mentioned before "-DPP" and "-TPD" in all cases.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After re-evaluating the paragraph, I have determined that all of the entities mentioned are related to material names. Therefore, the previous table is still accurate:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| BDTT - DPP |
| (BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP) |
| (BDTT-TPD)-(BDTT-DPP)-(BDTT-TPD) |
| BDTT - TPD |

All of these entities are either individual material names or combinations of material names, and they are presented in the same words as in the original paragraph.
